description: Generate a single sign-on request for the domain management portal.

postparametervalue.description: Post parameter value. Client should use 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' encoding for this value.

url.description: URL where the single sign-on request is to be made.

subscription_id.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).
